semantics.label: Visual settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control visual aspects.

fields.label: Image width
fields.description: Select the width of the space given that the image should cover. The image's height will be scaled accordingly and never exceed 100% width.

fields.label: Image alignment
fields.description: Select where the image should be positioned relative to the rest of the content.

fields.label: Zoom lens width
fields.description: Set the width of the zoom lens as percentage of the image's width (e.g. 20%) or as a fixed value in pixels (e.g. 160px).

fields.label: Zoom lens height
fields.description: Set the height of the zoom lens as percentage of the image's height (e.g. 25%) or as a fixed value in pixels (e.g. 90px).

fields.label: Darken image on zoom
fields.description: If set, the image will darken to strengthen the focussing effect of zooming.

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Automatic zooming
fields.description: If checked, the image gets magnified automatically while hovering it. Otherwise, the user needs to toggle magnification on and off.

fields.label: Hide magnification indicator
fields.description: The magnification indicator is used as the button for keyboard use. Hiding it will not prevent it from working, but users will have less navigational information.

fields.label: Magnify
fields.description: Label for magnification button (only visible to screenreader).

fields.label: Magnification activated.
fields.description: Read when the magnification was activated.

fields.label: Magnification deactivated.
fields.description: Read when the magnification was deactivated.

fields.label: Instructions
fields.description: Instructions on how to use the keyboard. Read when the magnification is activated
fields.default: Use arrow keys to move magnification lens. Use plus key to zoom in. Use minus key to zoom out.

fields.label: Zoomed to scale
fields.description: Read when the zoom scale is changed. @magnification is a placeholder that will be replaced by the respective value.

fields.label: Moved lens to
fields.description: Read when the magnification lens is moved. @positionHorizontal and @positionVertical are placeholders that will be replaced by the respective values.
fields.default: Moved lens to @positionHorizontal horizontally and to @positionVertical vertically.

fields.label: Unknown
fields.description: Fallback text for when the position of the lens cannot be determined.
